creator: Sbique GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Learn languages through conversations with native speakers on your phone – at any time, from anywhere. Sbique is your app for on-demand, 1-on-1 lessons with native speakers.

How does it work?


Easy. You just open the app, define the language, approximate length and topic of your lesson and hit the Matching button. We’ll find the best available tutor for you and you can go ahead with an immediate lesson over video chat. You enjoy maximum flexibility while improving your language skills. Benefit from our 7 levers for effective and convenient learning:

1 – Take immediate lessons


You decide that you want a lesson and get it immediately. You don’t commit your time in advance – after all, there is so much in life that can get in the way of our plans. You will never have to cancel a lesson and you will never need to work your schedule around one. Instead, you book immediate sessions whenever you have time and feel like it.

2 – Learn actively


Be in the driver’s seat! We let you simulate real-life situations through real-life conversations. There is no passive learning on Sbique – no gap-fill exercises and no “find the right translation”. That’s because we don’t only want you to pick the right answer on a test, we want you to actually become fluent. You will improve your listening skills, your pronunciation and your fluency – all by taking an active part in a tailored lesson and getting specific feedback from our qualified tutors.

3 – Talk to native speakers


All Sbique tutors are native speakers and all of them boast an impressive track record when it comes to teaching. You’ll be exposed to an authentic accent, but also learn how to use colloquialisms and modern language. Whether you’re just getting started or want to make that final step to full fluency – our native speakers got you covered.

4 – Get matched with the perfect tutor


Tired of finding a tutor for yourself? No problem! We’re picking the best tutor for you – our algorithm is trained to match you with a native speaker who you are likely to have a good connection with, based on your previous lessons. And once you’ve found one or many native speakers you like, you simply bookmark them to make sure we match you with them again in the future.

5 – Enjoy full mobility


Learn a language at any time and from anywhere, as long as you have your phone on you. All you need is this app – the video chat technology for your lessons is fully integrated. Leave the commute to your local language school in the past and enjoy the most flexible language learning experience out there.

6 – Focus on learning


We don’t do tandems and we will never expect you to teach ‘in return’. Your full lesson is dedicated to one goal, and one goal only – improving your language skills.

7 – Pay only by use


You only pay for the time you really spend in lessons as you’re charged by the minute for the real lesson length. There are no subscriptions or hidden fees. After all, it’s hard to know in advance exactly how long you will want a language lesson to be…

Get speaking, join Sbique!
descriptionShort: Improve your language skills through on-demand lessons with native tutors!
title: Sbique – Learn languages 1-on-1 at any time
